------------------------------------------


Ethan Hawke plays Tom Ricks, an American writer depressed he fled to Paris after a scandal that ruined his marriage and his career as a film teacher in a small American university. He wants to see his daughter, but there is a restraining order from the judge that he tries, unsuccessfully, to undo. With no money and no place to live, everything goes wrong in Harry's life. In a literary soiree, he meets a beautiful widow Hungarian Margit (Kristin Scott Thomas) in which a mysterious woman falls in love and becomes their only hope for a better future.
